channel.title: guide on zhangqq
channel.description: Recent content in guide on zhangqq

item.title: Blog guide
item.description: JekyllFor windows: Install Ruby Install Jekyll gem install jekyll Create a bolgjekyll new myblog cd myblog jekyll serve HugoDownload hugo. Choose hugo_extended_0.120.3_windows-amd64 which not need to install. And add the path of hugo to environment variables. Download the puppet theme on Hugo Themes. Create a blog Create a new site. hugo new site myblog Enter the myblog directory. cd myblog Pull the puppet theme to the local. git clone git@github.com:McShelby/hugo-theme-puppet.git themes/puppet Cut the files in the exampleSite directory of the puppet theme to which’s root directory, and delete the exampleSite folder.

item.title: Puppet - Getting Started
item.description: Puppet is a responsive, simple and clean Hugo theme based on the Huxblog Jekyll theme.
